fields.name: inactivetext
fields.fieldText: The following bank accounts will all be set to inactive once you proceed.

value.stringValue: Bank accounts that will be marked inactive

fields.name: newExplain
fields.fieldText: The following bank account will be created with a status of Active once you proceed.

fields.name: confirmVerify
fields.fieldText: I verify that that has been completed for you!

fields.name: confirmReject
fields.fieldText: That bank account has been marked as rejected.

fields.name: confirmHubwise
fields.fieldText: The bank accounts have been updated to reflect your hard work and dedication.

fields.name: replaceConfirm
fields.fieldText: Please confirm that all of the above financial products are associated with this bank account

fields.name: tableExplain
fields.fieldText: Please provide the details of the new bank account below.

validationRule.errorMessage: Please ensure this has the format of an 8 digit number
Please ensure this has the format XX-XX-XX

fields.name: jointExplain
fields.fieldText: Please select the owners of the new bank account below. Note that if you are adding a joint account, any other personal accounts for both clients will be marked as inactive.

fields.name: completeExplain
fields.fieldText: Once you click verify, any fulfilment that is currently waiting for bank details will be updated.
